name: Measure
description:
A plugin for easy measurement of sizes. The simple user interface allows you to add easily redlines for heights and widths, fill spaces, measure distances between elements and more.


How to use?

Click on the "How?" menu item in the upper right corner for more instructions.


Whats new in Version 3.2?


Figma Measure is now Measure


UI

  • Move navigation to top
  • Update icons
  • Add a new page to explain things
  • Add a new color picker
  • Remove some tooltips
  • Add padding stroke-caps
  • Fix hover effects
  • Add new color (black)


Functional changes

  • Fix some padding issues
  • Better handling of fills in tooltips. Show style names if they exist
  • Remove the global group and create groups in closest frame/group instead
  • Add detached mode to handle measurements by yourself.
  • Add constraints to created measurement lines
  • Remove ability to remove or hide all measurements. This is because there is no global group anymore.
  • Move all settings to node, to keep color, distance etc.
  • Display more fills
  • Measure padding and spacing of rotated elements
